member.name: ID3D10EffectType.GetDesc
member.param: A pointer to an effect-type description. See .
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectType.GetMemberName
member.summary: Get the name of a member.

member.name: ID3D10EffectType.GetMemberSemantic
member.summary: Get the semantic attached to a member.
member.returns: A string that contains the semantic.

member.name: ID3D10EffectType.GetMemberTypeByIndex
member.summary: Get a member type by index.

member.name: ID3D10EffectType.GetMemberTypeByName
member.summary: Get a member type by name.

member.name: ID3D10EffectType.GetMemberTypeBySemantic
member.summary: Get a member type by semantic.

member.name: ID3D10EffectType.IsValid
member.summary: Tests that the effect type is valid.
member.returns: TRUE if it is valid; otherwise FALSE.
